summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6150 for the improvement of 50th Avenue Southwest from West Oregon Street to approximately 90 feet north of West Edmunds Street; by constructing sewers, and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 85852, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
